original: Sahaseyyasikkhāpadepi “anupasampannehi saha nivutthabhāvaparimocanatthaṃ purāruṇā

analyzed: bhikkhūnam satta ppakaraṇa oggahaṇam ca eka ppahārena iva hoti iti mūla ṭīkāyam ca eka ppahārena ati

original: Ayuttañce chaḍḍayantu, mā hontu dummanādayoti.

original: Yasmā alajjitañca lajjitañca puthujjanānaṃ cittakkhaṇapaṭibaddhaṃ, na sabbakālikaṃ.
analyzed: yasmai a lajjitam ca lajjitam ca puthujjanānam citta khaṇa paṭibaddham na sabbakālikam

original: Sañcicca hi vītikkamacitte uppanne alajjino “na puna īdisaṃ karissāmī”ti cittena lajjino honti.
analyzed: sañcit ca hi vītikkama citte uppanne alajjinaḥ na punar īdisam karissāmi iti cittena lajjinaḥ honti

original: Tesu ca ye pesalehi ovadiyamānāpi na oramanti, punappunaṃ karonti, te eva asaṃvasitabbā,
analyzed: tesu ca ye pesalehi ovadiyamānā api na oramanti punappunam karonti te eva a saṃvasitabbā

analyzed: sodhetvā āva uposatha ādi karaṇam an aññātam tathā hi pārisuddhim āyasmantaḥ ārocetha

original: pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmī”tiādinā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathakaraṇassa ayuttatā
analyzed: pātimokkham uddisissāmi iti ādinā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposatha karaṇassa ayutta tā

analyzed: pakāsitā yassa siyā āpatti saḥ phāsu hoti iti evam alajjimpi lajji dhamme

analyzed: ca vuttaḥ sabbathā lajji dhammam an ukkamantehi saṃvāsassa ayutta tāya nissaya dāna ggahaṇa paṭikkhepo

analyzed: āpatti eva dummaṅkūnam puggalānam niggaha tthāya iva sabba sikkhāpadānam paññatta ttā ti

original: Tassa santiketi mahārakkhitattherassa santike.

original: Rūpiyādipaṭiggahaṇavinicchayakathālaṅkāro nāma
analyzed: rūpiya ādi paṭiggahaṇa vinicchaya kathā alaṅkāraḥ nāma

original: Dvādasamo paricchedo.
analyzed: dvādasamaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: 13. Dānalakkhaṇādivinicchayakathā
69. Evaṃ rūpiyādipaṭiggahaṇavinicchayaṃ kathetvā idāni dānavissāsaggāhalābhapariṇāmanavinicchayaṃ

original: kathetuṃ “dānavissāsaggāhehī”tiādimāha. Tattha dīyate dānaṃ, cīvarādivatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ

original: katvā pavatto alobhappadhāno kāmāvacarakusalakiriyacittuppādo. Sasanaṃ sāso, sasu

original: hiṃsāyanti dhātu, hiṃsananti attho, vigato sāso etasmā gāhāti vissāso. Gahaṇaṃ gāho,

original: vissāsena gāho vissāsaggāho. Visesane cettha karaṇavacanaṃ, vissāsavasena gāho, na

original: theyyacittavasenāti attho. Lacchateti lābho, cīvarādivatthu, tassa lābhassa. Pariṇamiyate
analyzed: theyya citta vasena ati attho lacchatā iti lābho cīvara ādi vatthu tassa lābhassa pariṇamiyate

original: pariṇāmanaṃ, aññesaṃ atthāya pariṇatassa attano, aññassa vā pariṇāmanaṃ, dāpananti

original: attho. Dānavissāsaggāhehi lābhassa pariṇāmananti ettha uddese samabhiniviṭṭhassa
analyzed: atthaḥ dāna vissāsa ggāhehi lābhassa ettha uddese samabhiniviṭṭhassa

original: “dāna”nti padassa atthavinicchayo tāva paṭhamaṃ evaṃ veditabboti yojanā. Attano santakassa
analyzed: dānam ti padassa attha vinicchayo tāva paṭhamam evam veditabbaḥ iti yojanā attano santakassa

original: cīvarādiparikkhārassa dānanti sambandho. Yassa kassacīti sampadānaniddeso, yassa
analyzed: cīvara ādi parikkhārassa dānam ti sambandhaḥ yassa kassaci iti sampadāna niddesaḥ yassa

original: kassaci paṭiggāhakassāti attho.
analyzed: kassaci paṭiggāhakassa ati attho

original: Yadidaṃ “dāna”nti vuttaṃ, tattha kiṃ lakkhaṇanti āha “tatridaṃ dānalakkhaṇa”nti.
analyzed: yat idam dānam nti vuttam tattha kim lakkhaṇan ti āha tatra idam dāna lakkhaṇan ti

original: “Idaṃ tuyhaṃ demī”ti vadatīti idaṃ tivaṅgasampannaṃ dānalakkhaṇaṃ hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: idam tuyham demi iti vadati iti idam tivaṅga sampannam dāna lakkhaṇam hoti iti yojanā

original: Tattha idanti deyyadhammanidassanaṃ. Tuyhanti paṭiggāhakanidassanaṃ. Demīti dāyakanidassanaṃ.
analyzed: tattha idam ti deyya dhamma nidassanam tuyhanti paṭiggāhaka nidassanam demi iti dāyaka nidassanam

original: Dadāmītiādīni pana pariyāyavacanāni. Vuttañhi “deyyadāyakapaṭiggāhakā viya dānassā”ti,
analyzed: dadāmi itiādīni pana pariyāya vacanāni vuttam hi deyya dāyaka paṭiggāhakāḥ viya dānassa ati

original: “tiṇṇaṃ sammukhībhāvā kusalaṃ hotī”ti ca. “Vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassā”ti
analyzed: tiṇṇam sammukhībhāvā kusalam hoti iti ca vatthu pariccāga lakkhaṇa ttā dānassa ati

original: idaṃ pana ekadesalakkhaṇakathanameva, kiṃ evaṃ dīyamānaṃ sammukhāyeva dinnaṃ hoti,
analyzed: idam pana eka desa lakkhaṇa kathanam eva kim evam dīyamānam sammukhāya iva dinnam hoti

original: udāhu parammukhāpīti āha “sammukhāpi parammukhāpi dinnaṃyeva hotī”ti. Tuyhaṃ gaṇhāhītiādīsu
analyzed: udāhu parammukhā api iti āha sammukhā api parammukhā api hoti iti tuyham gaṇhāhi itiādīsu

original: ayamattho – “gaṇhāhī”ti vutte “demī”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti, tasmā mukhyato dinnattā
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ gaṇhāhi iti vutte demi iti vutta sadisam hoti tasmā mukhyatas dinna ttā

original: sudinnaṃ hoti, “gaṇhāmī”ti ca vutte mukhyato gahaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā suggahitaṃ hoti.

analyzed: tam kusaraññaḥ mātu rajja niyyātanam tena āha na iva dātā dātum jānāti na itaraḥ gahetunti

original: Sace panātiādīsu pana dāyakena paññattiyaṃ akovidatāya pariyāyavacane vuttepi paṭiggāhako

analyzed: gahetvā paribhuñjitabbam paribhuñjantena pana dāyakena pubba adhiṭṭhitam pi dāna vasena

original: idha vuttalakkhaṇena asammohato jānitabbanti dasseti.
analyzed: idha vutta lakkhaṇena asammohataḥ jānitabbanti dasseti

original: kho sāmike jīvante vissāsaggāhacīvarabhāvena ca sāmike mate matakacīvarabhāvena ca

original: gahaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, tato pana dasāhe anatikkanteyeva ticīvarādhiṭṭhānaṃ vā parikkhāracoḷādhiṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: gahaṇam sandhāya vuttam tatas pana dasa ahe an atikkante yeva ti cīvara adhiṭṭhānam vā parikkhāra coḷa adhiṭṭhānam

original: Pariccajitvā…pe… na labhati, āharāpento bhaṇḍagghena kāretabboti attho. Attanā…pe…
analyzed: na labhati āharāpentaḥ bhaṇḍagghena kāretabbaḥ iti atthaḥ attanāpe

original: nissaggiyanti iminā parasantakabhūtattaṃ jānanto theyyapasayhavasena acchindanto

original: pārājiko hotīti dasseti. Porāṇaṭīkāyaṃ pana “sakasaññāya vinā gaṇhanto bhaṇḍaṃ agghāpetvā
analyzed: pārājikaḥ hoti iti dasseti porāṇaṭīkāyam pana saka saññāya vinā gaṇhantaḥ bhaṇḍam agghāpetvā

analyzed: āpattiyā kāretabbaḥ ti vuttam saka saññāya vinā api tāvakālika paṃsukūla saññā ādi vasena

original: panātiādinā kupitadānaṃ. Ubhayathāpi sayaṃ dinnattā vaṭṭati, gahaṇe āpatti natthīti attho.

original: Mama santike…pe… evaṃ pana dātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti vatthupariccāgalakkhaṇattā dānassa

analyzed: evam dadantaḥ a pariccajitvā dinna ttā dānam na hoti iti na vaṭṭati tatas eva dukkaṭam

original: hoti. Āharāpetuṃ pana vaṭṭatīti pubbe “akarontassa na demī”ti vuttattā yathāvuttaupajjhāyaggahaṇādīni
analyzed: hoti āhara āpetum pana vaṭṭati iti pubbe a karontassa na demi iti vutta ttā yathā vutta upajjhāya ggahaṇa ādīni

original: akaronte ācariyasseva santakaṃ hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. Karonte pana antevāsikassa santakaṃ
analyzed: a karonte ācariyassa iva santakam hoti iti katvā vuttam karonte pana antevāsikassa santakam

original: bhaveyya sabbaso apariccajitvā dinnattā. Sakasaññāya vijjamānattā “āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
analyzed: bhaveyya sabbasas a pariccajitvā dinna ttā saka saññāya vijjamāna ttā āhara āpetum vaṭṭati iti

original: vuttaṃ siyā. Ṭīkāyaṃ pana “evaṃ dinnaṃ bhatisadisattā āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.

original: Bhatisadise satipi kamme kate bhati laddhabbā hoti, tasmā āropetuṃ na vaṭṭeyya. Vimativinodaniyaṃ

original: pana “āharāpetuṃ vaṭṭatīti kamme akate bhatisadisattā vutta”nti vuttaṃ, tena kamme

original: kate āharāpetuṃ na vaṭṭatīti siddhaṃ. Upajjhaṃ gaṇhissatīti sāmaṇerassa dānaṃ dīpeti,

original: anuññātattāti dasseti. Tathā bāhiraparibhogatthāya gahetvā ṭhapitatelādiṃ ajjhoharitukāmatāya
analyzed: anuññāta ttā ti dasseti tathā bāhira paribhoga tthāya gahetvā ṭhapita tela ādim ajjhoharitu kāma tāya

original: sati paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Udukkhalamusalādīni khīyantīti
analyzed: sati paṭiggahetvā paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti dasseti udukkhala musala ādīni khīyanti iti

original: ettha udukkhalamusalānaṃ khayena pisitakoṭṭitabhesajjesu sace āgantukavaṇṇo paññāyati,
analyzed: ettha udukkhala musalānam khayena pisita koṭṭita bhesajjesu sace āgantuka vaṇṇaḥ paññāyati

original: na vaṭṭati. Suddhaṃ udakaṃ hotīti rukkhasākhādīhi gaḷitvā patanaudakaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: na vaṭṭati suddham udakam hoti iti rukkha sākhā ādīhi gaḷitvā patana odakam sandhāya vuttam

original: 109. Patto vāssa paṭiggahetabboti etthāpi pattagataṃ chupitvā dentassa hatthe laggena
analyzed: pattaḥ vā assa paṭiggahetabbaḥ ti ettha api patta gatam chupitvā dentassa hatthe laggena

original: āmisena dosābhāvatthaṃ pattapaṭiggahaṇanti abbhantaraparibhogatthameva pattapaṭiggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: āmisena dosa abhāva ttham patta paṭiggahaṇam ti abbhantara paribhoga ttham eva patta paṭiggahaṇam

original: veditabbaṃ. Yaṃ sāmaṇerassa patte patati…pe… paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahatīti ettha punappunaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam yam sāmaṇerassa patte patatipe paṭiggahaṇam na vijahati iti ettha punappunam

original: gaṇhantassa attano patte pakkhittameva attano santakanti sanniṭṭhānakaraṇato hatthagataṃ
analyzed: gaṇhantassa attano patte pakkhittam eva attano santakam ti sanniṭṭhāna karaṇato hattha gatam

original: paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati. Paricchinditvā dinnaṃ pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇasamayeyeva
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇam na vijahati paricchinditvā dinnam pana gaṇhantassa gahaṇa samayeya iva

original: attano santakanti sanniṭṭhānassa katattā hatthagataṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Kesañci
analyzed: attanaḥ santakam ti sanniṭṭhānassa kata ttā hattha gatam paṭiggahaṇam vijahati kesañci

original: atthāya bhattaṃ pakkhipatīti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipantepi āgantvā
analyzed: atthāya bhattam pakkhipati iti ettha anupasampannassa atthāya pakkhipante api āgantvā

original: gaṇhissatīti sayameva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanato paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati. Anupasampannassa
analyzed: gaṇhissati iti sayam eva pakkhipitvā ṭhapanataḥ paṭiggahaṇam na vijahati an upasampannassa

original: hatthe pakkhittaṃ pana anupasampanneneva ṭhapitaṃ nāma hotīti paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati
analyzed: hatthe pakkhittam pana an upasampannena iva ṭhapitam nāma hoti iti paṭiggahaṇam vijahati

original: pariccattabhāvato. Tena vuttaṃ “sāmaṇera…pe… pariccattattā”ti. Kesañcītiādīsu anupasampannānaṃ
analyzed: pariccatta bhāvataḥ tena vuttam sāmaṇerape pariccatta ttā ati kesañci iti ādīsu anupasampannānam

original: atthāya katthaci ṭhapiyamānampi hatthato muttamatte eva paṭiggahaṇaṃ na vijahati,
analyzed: atthāya katthaci ṭhapiyamānam pi hatthataḥ mutta matte eva paṭiggahaṇam na vijahati

original: atha kho bhājane patitameva paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahati. Bhājanañca bhikkhunā punadivasatthāya
analyzed: atha kho bhājane patitam eva paṭiggahaṇam vijahati bhājanam ca bhikkhunā puna divasa tthāya

original: apekkhitamevāti taggatampi āmisaṃ duddhotapattagataṃ viya paṭiggahaṇaṃ vijahatīti
analyzed: apekkhitam eva ati taggatam pi āmisam duddha uta patta gatam viya paṭiggahaṇam vijahati iti

original: saṅkāya “sāmaṇerassa hatthe pakkhipitabba”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Īdisesu hi yutti
analyzed: saṅkāya sāmaṇerassa hatthe pakkhipitabbanti vuttanti veditabbam īdisesu hi yutti

original: na gavesitabbā, vuttanayeneva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: na gavesitabbā vutta nayena iva paṭipajjitabbam

original: 110. Pattagatā yāgūti iminā pattamukhavaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhepi kuṭe yāgu paṭiggahitā, uggahitā
analyzed: patta gatā yāgu iti iminā patta mukha vaṭṭiyā phuṭṭhe api kuṭe yāgu paṭiggahitā uggahitā

original: vā na hoti bhikkhuno anicchāya phuṭṭhattāti dasseti. Āropetīti hatthaṃ phusāpeti.
analyzed: vā na hoti bhikkhuno anicchāya phuṭṭha ttā ati dasseti āropeti iti hattham phusāpeti

original: Paṭiggahaṇūpagaṃ bhāraṃ nāma thāmamajjhimassa purisassa ukkhepārahaṃ. Kiñcāpi avissajjetvāva
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇa upagam bhāram nāma thāma majjhimassa purisassa ukkhepa araham kiñca api a vissajjetvā ava

original: aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi, tathāpi na pidahitabbanti aṭṭhakathāpamāṇeneva
analyzed: aññena hatthena pidahantassa doso natthi tathā api na pidahitabbanti aṭṭhakathā pamāṇena iva

original: gahetabbaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “na pidahitabbanti hatthato muttaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
analyzed: gahetabbam vimati vinodaniyam pana na pidahitabbanti hatthataḥ muttam sandhāya vuttam

original: hatthagataṃ pana itarena hatthena pidahato, hatthato muttampi vā aphusitvā upari
analyzed: hattha gatam pana itarena hatthena pidahataḥ hatthataḥ muttam pi vā a phusitvā upari

original: pidhānaṃ pātentassa na doso”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pidhānam pātentassa na doso ti vuttam

original: 111. Paṭiggaṇhātīti chāyatthāya upari dhāriyamānā mahāsākhā yena kenaci chijjeyya, tattha laggarajaṃ mukhe pāteyya vāti kappiyaṃ kārāpetvā paṭiggaṇhāti.
analyzed: paṭiggaṇhāti iti chāya atthāya upari dhāriyamānā mahā sākhā yena kenacid chijjeyya tattha lagga rajam mukhe vāti kappiyam kārāpetvā paṭiggaṇhāti

original: Macchikavāraṇatthanti ettha “sacepi sākhāya laggarajaṃ patte patati, sukhena paribhuñjituṃ
analyzed: ettha sace pi lagga rajam patte patati sukhena paribhuñjitum

original: sakkāti sākhāya paṭiggahitattā abbhantaraparibhogatthamevidha paṭiggahaṇanti mūlapaṭiggahaṇameva
analyzed: sakkā iti sākhāya paṭiggahita ttā paṭiggahaṇam evidha paṭiggahaṇam eva

original: vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Apare pana “macchikavāraṇatthanti vacanamattaṃ gahetvā bāhiraparibhogatthaṃ
analyzed: vaṭṭati iti vuttam apare pana macchika vāraṇa attham ti vacana mattam gahetvā bāhira paribhoga attham

original: gahita”nti vadanti. Kuṇḍaketi mahāghaṭe. Tasmimpīti cāṭighaṭepi. Anupasampannaṃ gāhāpetvāti
analyzed: vadanti kuṇḍaka iti mahā ghaṭe tasmin pi iti cāṭi ghaṭe pi anupasampannam gāhāpetvā iti

original: tameva ajjhoharaṇīyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ anupasampannena gāhāpetvā.
analyzed: tam eva ajjhoharaṇīyam bhaṇḍam an upasampannena gāhāpetvā

original: Therassa pattaṃ dutiyattherassāti “therassa pattaṃ mayhaṃ dethā”ti tena attano pariccajāpetvā
analyzed: therassa pattam dutiya therassa ati therassa pattam mayham detha ati tena attano pariccajāpetvā

original: dutiyattherassa deti. Tuyhaṃ yāguṃ mayhaṃ dehīti ettha evaṃ vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ
analyzed: dutiya therassa deti tuyham yāgum mayham dehi iti ettha evam vatvā sāmaṇerassa pattaṃ

original: gahetvā attanopi pattaṃ tassa deti. Ettha panāti “paṇḍito sāmaṇero”tiādipattaparivattanakathāyaṃ.
analyzed: gahetvā attano pi pattam tassa deti ettha pana ati

original: Kāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitabbanti yathā mātuādīnaṃ telādīni haranto tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena
analyzed: kāraṇam upaparikkhitabbanti yathā mātu ādīnam tela ādīni harantaḥ tathārūpe kicce anupasampannena

original: aparivattetvāva paribhuñjituṃ labhati, evamidha pattaparivattanaṃ akatvā paribhuñjituṃ
analyzed: a parivattetvā ava paribhuñjitum labhati evam idha patta parivattanam a katvā paribhuñjitum

original: kasmā na labhatīti kāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti attho. Ettha pana “sāmaṇerehi gahitataṇḍulesu
analyzed: kasmā na labhati iti kāraṇam vīmaṃsitabbanti atthaḥ ettha pana sāmaṇerehi gahita taṇḍulesu

original: parikkhīṇesu avassaṃ amhākaṃ sāmaṇerā saṅgahaṃ karontīti cittuppatti sambhavati,
analyzed: parikkhīṇesu avassam amhākam sāmaṇerāḥ saṅgaham karonti iti citta uppatti sambhavati

original: tasmā taṃ parivattetvāva paribhuñjitabbaṃ. Mātāpitūnaṃ atthāya pana chāyatthāya vā
analyzed: tasmā tam parivattetvā ava paribhuñjitabbam mātā pitūnam atthāya pana chāyā atthāya vā

original: gahaṇe paribhogāsā natthi, tasmā taṃ vaṭṭatī”ti kāraṇaṃ vadanti. Teneva ācariyabuddhadattattherenapi vuttaṃ –
analyzed: gahaṇe paribhoga āsā na atthi tasmā tam vaṭṭati iti kāraṇam vadanti tena iva ācariya buddhadatta ttherena api vuttam

original: “Mātāpitūnamatthāya, telādiṃ haratopi ca;
analyzed: ca

original: Sākhaṃ chāyādiatthāya, imassa na visesatā.
analyzed: chāyā ādi atthāya imassa na visesa tā

original: “Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
analyzed: tasmā hi ssa visesassa cintetabbam tu kāraṇam

original: Tassa sālayabhāvaṃ tu, visesaṃ takkayāmaha”nti.
analyzed: tassa sa ālaya bhāvam tu visesam

original: Idamevettha yuttataraṃ avassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattiyā sambhavato. Na hi sakkā
analyzed: idam eva ittha yuttataram tathāvidha vitakku ppattiyā sambhavataḥ na hi sakkā

original: ettha vitakkaṃ sodhetunti. Mātādīnaṃ atthāya haraṇe pana nāvassaṃ tathāvidhavitakkuppattīti
analyzed: ettha vitakkam sodhetunti mātā ādīnam atthāya haraṇe pana na avassam tathāvidha vitakka uppatti iti

original: sakkā vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ. Yattha hi vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ sakkā, tattha nevatthi doso.
analyzed: sakkā vitakkam sodhetum yattha hi vitakkam sodhetum sakkā tattha na iva atthi doso

original: Teneva vakkhati “sace pana sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetuṃ, tato laddhaṃ khāditumpi vaṭṭatī”ti.
analyzed: tena iva vakkhati sace pana sakkoti vitakkam sodhetum tatas laddham khāditum pi vaṭṭati iti

original: Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “ettha panāti pattaparivattane. Kāraṇanti ettha yathā sāmaṇerā
analyzed: vimati vinodaniyam pana ettha pana ati patta parivattane kāraṇanti ettha yathā sāmaṇerā

original: ito amhākampi dentīti vitakko uppajjati, na tathā aññatthāti kāraṇaṃ vadanti, tañca
analyzed: itas amhākam pi denti iti vitakkaḥ uppajjati na tathā aññattha ati kāraṇam vadanti tat ca

original: yuttaṃ. Yassa pana tādiso vitakko natthi, tena aparivattetvāpi bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: yuttam yassa pana tādisaḥ vitakkaḥ na atthi tena a parivattetvā api bhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti vuttam

original: 112. Niccāletunti cāletvā pāsāṇasakkharādiapanayanaṃ kātuṃ. Uddhanaṃ āropetabbanti
analyzed: nicca āletum ti cāletvā pāsāṇa sakkhara ādi apanayanam kātum uddhanam āropetabbanti

original: anaggikaṃ uddhanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uddhane paccamānassa āluḷane upari apakkataṇḍulā
analyzed: anaggikam uddhanam sandhāya vuttam uddhane paccamānassa āluḷane upari apakka taṇḍulā

original: heṭṭhā pavisitvā paccantīti āha “sāmaṃpākañceva hotī”ti.
analyzed: heṭṭhā pavisitvā paccanti iti āha sāmaṃpākam ca iva hoti iti

original: 113. Ādhārake patto ṭhapitoti appaṭiggahitāmiso patto puna paṭiggahaṇatthāya ṭhapito.
analyzed: ādhārake patto ṭhapito ti a paṭiggahita āmiso patto puna paṭiggahaṇa tthāya ṭhapito

original: Cāletīti vinā kāraṇaṃ cāleti, satipi kāraṇe bhikkhūnaṃ paribhogārahaṃ cāletuṃ na
analyzed: cāleti iti vinā kāraṇam cāleti sati api kāraṇe bhikkhūnam paribhoga araham cāletum na

original: vaṭṭati. Kiñcāpi “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, amanussikābādhe āmakamaṃsaṃ āmakalohita”nti
analyzed: vaṭṭati kiñca api anujānāmi bhikkhave amanussikā ābādhe āmaka maṃsam āmaka lohitanti

original: tādise ābādhe attano atthāya āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇaṃ anuññātaṃ, “āmakamaṃsapaṭiggahaṇā
analyzed: tādise ābādhe attanaḥ atthāya āmaka maṃsa paṭiggahaṇam anuññātam āmaka maṃsa paṭiggahaṇā

original: paṭivirato hotī”ti ca sāmaññato paṭikkhittaṃ, tathāpi attano, aññassa vā bhikkhuno
analyzed: paṭivirataḥ hoti iti ca sāmaññato paṭikkhittam tathā api attanaḥ aññassa vā bhikkhuno

original: atthāya aggahitattā “sīhavighāsādiṃ…pe… vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṃ. Sakkoti vitakkaṃ sodhetunti
analyzed: atthāya agga hita ttā sīha vighāsa ādiṃpe vaṭṭati iti vuttam sakkoti vitakkam sodhetun ti

original: “mayhampi detī”ti vitakkassa anuppannabhāvaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti, “sāmaṇerassa dassāmī”ti
analyzed: mayham pi deti iti vitakkassa anuppanna bhāvam sallakkhetum sakkoti sāmaṇerassa dassāmi iti

original: suddhacittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetuṃ sakkoti. Sace pana mūlepi paṭiggahitaṃ
analyzed: suddha cittena mayā gahitanti vā sallakkhetum sakkoti sace pana mūle pi paṭiggahitam

original: hotīti ettha “gahetvā gate mayhampi dadeyyunti saññāya sace paṭiggahitaṃ hotī”ti vadanti.
analyzed: hoti iti ettha gahetvā gate mayham pi dadeyyunti saññāya sace paṭiggahitam hoti iti vadanti

original: 114. Koṭṭhāse karotīti “bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca attano attano abhirucitaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gaṇhantū”ti
analyzed: koṭṭhāse karoti iti bhikkhū sāmaṇerā ca attanaḥ attanaḥ abhirucitam koṭṭhāsam gaṇhantu uti

original: sabbesaṃ samake koṭṭhāse karoti. Gahitāvasesanti sāmaṇerehi gahitakoṭṭhāsato avasesaṃ.
analyzed: sabbesam samake koṭṭhāse karoti gahita avasesam ti sāmaṇerehi gahita koṭṭhāsato avasesam

original: Gaṇhitvāti “mayhaṃ idaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti gahetvā. Idha gahitāvasesaṃ nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitaṃ.
analyzed: gaṇhitvā ti mayham idam gaṇhissāmi iti gahetvā idha gahita avasesam nāma tena gaṇhitvā puna ṭhapitam

original: Paṭiggahetvāti tadahu paṭiggahetvā. Teneva “yāvakālikena yāvajīvikasaṃsagge doso
analyzed: paṭiggahetvā ti tat ahu paṭiggahetvā tena iva yāvakālikena yāvajīvika saṃsagge dosaḥ

original: natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Sace pana purimadivase paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti, sāmisena mukhena
analyzed: natthi iti vuttam sace pana purima divase paṭiggahetvā ṭhapitā hoti sa āmisena mukhena

original: tassā vaṭṭiyā dhūmaṃ pivituṃ na vaṭṭati. Samuddodakenāti appaṭiggahitasamuddodakena.
analyzed: tassāḥ vaṭṭiyāḥ dhūmam pivitum na vaṭṭati samudda udakena ati a paṭiggahita samudda udakena

original: Himakarakā nāma kadāci vassodakena saha patanakā pāsāṇalekhā viya ghanībhūtā udakavisesā,
analyzed: himakarakā nāma kadāci vassa udakena saha patanakā pāsāṇa lekhā viya ghanībhūtā udaka visesā

original: tesu paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi. Tenāha “udakagatikā evā”ti. Yasmā katakaṭṭhi udakaṃ
analyzed: tesu paṭiggahaṇa kiccam natthi tena āha udaka gatikāḥ eva iti yasmā katakaṭṭhi udakam

original: pasādetvā visuṃ tiṭṭhati, tasmā “abbohārika”nti vuttaṃ. Iminā appaṭiggahitāpattīhi
analyzed: pasādetvā visum tiṭṭhati tasmai abbohārikanti vuttam iminā a paṭiggahita āpattīhi

original: abbohārikaṃ, vikālabhojanāpattīhipi abbohārikanti dasseti. Laggatīti sukkhe mukhe
analyzed: abbohārikam abbohārikam dasseti laggati iti sukkhe mukhe

original: ca hatthe ca mattikāvaṇṇaṃ dassentaṃ laggati. Bahalanti hatthamukhesu alagganakampi paṭiggahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca hatthe ca mattikā vaṇṇam dassentam laggati hattha mukhesu a lagganakam pi paṭiggahetabbam

original: Vāsamattanti reṇukhīrābhāvaṃ dasseti. Pānīyaṃ gahetvāti attanoyeva atthāya gahetvā.
analyzed: vāsam attanti reṇu khīra abhāvam dassa iti pānīyam gahetvā iti attanoya iva atthāya gahetvā

original: Sace pana pītāvasesakaṃ tattheva ākirissāmīti gaṇhāti, puna paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ natthi.
analyzed: sace pana pīta avasesakam tattha eva ākirissāmi iti gaṇhāti puna paṭiggahaṇa kiccam natthi

original: Ākirati, paṭiggahetabbanti puppharasassa paññāyanato vuttaṃ. Vikkhambhetvāti viyūhitvā, apanetvāti attho.
analyzed: ākirati paṭiggahetabbanti puppha rasassa paññāyanataḥ vuttam vikkhambhetvā iti viyūhitvā apanetvā ati attho

original: 115. Mahābhūtesūti pāṇasarīrasannissitesu pathavīādimahābhūtesu. Sabbaṃ vaṭṭatīti
analyzed: mahābhūtesu iti pāṇa sarīra sannissitesu pathavī ādi mahābhūtesu sabbam vaṭṭati iti

original: attano paresañca sarīrasannissitaṃ sabbaṃ vaṭṭati, akappiyamaṃsānulomatāya thullaccayādiṃ
analyzed: attano paresam ca sarīra sannissitam sabbam vaṭṭati akappiya maṃsa anuloma tāya thullaccaya ādim

original: na janetīti adhippāyo. Patatīti attano sarīrato chijjitvā patati. “Rukkhato chinditvā”ti
analyzed: na janeti iti adhippāyaḥ patati iti attanaḥ sarīrataḥ chijjitvā patati rukkhataḥ chinditvā ati

original: vuttattā mattikatthāya pathaviṃ khaṇituṃ, aññampi yaṃ kiñci mūlapaṇṇādivisabhesajjaṃ
analyzed: vutta ttā mattika tthāya pathavim khaṇitum aññam pi yam kiñci mūla paṇṇa ādi visa bhesajjam

original: chinditvā chārikaṃ akatvāpi appaṭiggahitampi paribhuñjituṃ vaṭṭatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: chinditvā chārikam a katvā api a paṭiggahitam pi paribhuñjitum vaṭṭati iti daṭṭhabbam

original: Iti vinayasaṅgahasaṃvaṇṇanābhūte vinayālaṅkāre
analyzed: iti vinaya saṅgaha saṃvaṇṇanā bhūte vinaya alaṅkāre

original: Paṭiggahaṇavinicchayakathālaṅkāro nāma
analyzed: paṭiggahaṇa vinicchaya kathā alaṅkāraḥ nāma

original: Vīsatimo paricchedo.

analyzed: saṃvāsassa sādita ttā saṃvāsa thenakaḥ api na hoti anupasampannaḥ pana liṅga tthenakaḥ

original: kāraṇaṃ vuttaṃ, tampi idameva kāraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Itarathā sāmaṇerassāpi bhikkhuvassagaṇanādīsu
analyzed: kāraṇam vuttam tam pi idam eva kāraṇam sandhāya vuttam itarathā sāmaṇerassa api bhikkhu vassa gaṇanā ādīsu

analyzed: dvāvīsatimaḥ paricchedaḥ

original: kittetabbaṃ. Evaṃ bahūnampi khaṇḍasīmānaṃ sīmantarikapāsāṇā paccekaṃ kittetabbā.
analyzed: kittetabbam evam bahūnam pi khaṇḍa sīmānam sīmantarika pāsāṇā paccekam kittetabbā

original: Tatoti pacchā. Avasesanimittānīti mahāsīmāya bāhirantaresu avasesanimittāni. Na sakkhissantīti
analyzed: tatas ti pacchā avasesa nimittāni iti mahāsīmāya bāhirantaresu avasesa nimittāni na sakkhissanti iti

original: avippavāsasīmāya baddhabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā “samānasaṃvāsakasīmameva samūhanissāmā”ti
analyzed: a vippavāsa sīmāya baddha bhāvam a saṃlakkhetvā samāna saṃvāsaka sīmam eva samūha nissāma ati

original: vāyamantā na sakkhissanti. Baddhāya hi avippavāsasīmāya taṃ samūhanitvā “samānasaṃvāsakasīmaṃ
analyzed: vāyamantāḥ na sakkhissanti baddhāya hi a vippavāsa sīmāya tam samūhanitvā samāna saṃvāsaka sīmam

original: samūhanissāmā”ti katāyapi kammavācāya asamūhatāva hoti sīmā. Paṭhamañhi avippavāsaṃ
analyzed: kamma vācāya hoti sīmā paṭhamam hi a vippavāsam

original: samūhanitvā pacchā sīmā samūhanitabbā. Khaṇḍasīmato paṭṭhāya bandhanaṃ āciṇṇaṃ, āciṇṇakaraṇeneva
analyzed: samūhanitvā pacchā sīmā samūhanitabbā khaṇḍa sīmataḥ paṭṭhāya bandhanam āciṇṇam āciṇṇa karaṇena iva

original: ca sammoho na hotīti āha “khaṇḍasīmatova paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā”ti. Ubhinnampi na kopentīti
analyzed: ca sammohaḥ na hoti iti āha khaṇḍa sīmataḥ va paṭṭhāya bandhitabbā ati ubhinnam pi na kopenti iti

original: ubhinnampi kammaṃ na kopenti. Evaṃ baddhāsu pana…pe… sīmantarikā hi gāmakkhettaṃ
analyzed: ubhinnam pi kammam na kopenti evam baddhāsu panape sīmantarikā hi gāma khettam

original: bhajatīti na āvāsavasena sāmaggiparicchedo, kintu sīmāvasenevāti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
analyzed: bhajati iti na āvāsa vasena sāmaggi paricchedo kintu sīmā vasena iva āti dassana attham vuttam

original: Kuṭigeheti bhūmiyaṃ katatiṇakuṭiyaṃ. Udukkhalanti udukkhalāvāṭasadisakhuddakāvāṭaṃ.
analyzed: kuṭi gehā iti bhūmiyam kata tiṇa kuṭiyam udukkhalanti udukkhala āvāṭa sadisa khuddaka āvāṭam

original: Nimittaṃ na kātabbanti rāji vā udukkhalaṃ vā nimittaṃ na kātabbaṃ. Idañca yathāvuttesu
analyzed: nimittam na kātabbanti rāji vā udukkhalam vā nimittam na kātabbam idam ca yathā vuttesu

original: aṭṭhasu nimittesu anāgatattena na vaṭṭatīti siddhampi “avinassakasaññāṇamida”nti
analyzed: aṭṭhasu nimittesu anāgata ttena na vaṭṭati iti siddham pi avinassaka saññāṇam idam ti

original: saññāya koci mohena nimittaṃ kareyyāti dūrato vipattiparihāratthaṃ vuttaṃ. Nimittupagapāsāṇe
analyzed: saññāya koci mohena nimittam kareyya ati dūratas vipatti parihāra attham vuttam nimitta upaga pāsāṇe

original: ṭhapetvāti sañcārimanimittassa kampanatāya vuttaṃ. Evaṃ upari “bhittiṃ akittetvā”tiādīsupi
analyzed: ṭhapetvā ti sañcārima nimittassa kampanatāya vuttam evam upari bhittim a kittetvā ati ādīsu pi

original: siddhamevatthaṃ punappunaṃ kathane kāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sīmāvipatti hi upasampadādisabbakammavipattimūlanti
analyzed: siddham evattham punappunam kathane kāraṇam veditabbam sīmā vipatti hi upasampad ādi sabba kamma vipatti mūlan ti

original: tassa dvāraṃ sabbathāpi pidahanavasena vattabbaṃ. Sabbaṃ vatvāva idha ācariyā vinicchayaṃ
analyzed: tassa dvāram sabbathā api pidahana vasena vattabbam sabbam vatvā vai idha ācariyāḥ vinicchayam

original: kathesunti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: kathesun ti daṭṭhabbam

original: Bhittinti iṭṭhakadārumattikāmayaṃ. Silāmayāya pana bhittiyā nimittupagaṃ ekaṃ pāsāṇaṃ
analyzed: bhittim ti iṭṭhaka dāru mattikā mayam silā mayāya pana bhittiyā nimitta upagam ekam pāsāṇam

original: taṃtaṃdisāya kittetuṃ vaṭṭati. Anekasilāhi cinitaṃ sakalaṃ bhittiṃ kittetuṃ na vaṭṭati
analyzed: taṃ taṃdisāya kittetum vaṭṭati aneka silāhi cinitam sakalam bhittim kittetum na vaṭṭati

original: “eso pāsāṇo nimitta”nti ekavacanena vattabbato. Antokuṭṭamevāti ettha antokuṭṭepi
analyzed: esaḥ pāsāṇaḥ nimittam ti ekavacanena vattabbataḥ antokuṭṭam eva āti ettha antokuṭṭe pi

original: nimittānaṃ ṭhitokāsato anto eva sīmāti gahetabbaṃ. Pamukhe nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvāti
analyzed: nimittānam ṭhita ukāsataḥ antar eva sīmā ati gahetabbam pamukhe nimitta pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā ati

original: gabbhābhimukhepi bahipamukhe gabbhavitthārappamāṇe ṭhāne pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā.
analyzed: gabbha abhimukhe api bahi pamukhe gabbha vitthāra ppamāṇe ṭhāne pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sammannitabbā

original: Evañhi gabbhapamukhānaṃ antare ṭhitakuṭṭampi upādāya anto ca bahi ca caturassasaṇṭhānāva
analyzed: evam hi gabbha pamukhānam antare ṭhita kuṭṭam pi upādāya anto ca bahi ca

original: sīmā hoti. Bahīti sakalassa kuṭileṇassa samantato bahi.
analyzed: sīmā hoti bahi iti sakalassa kuṭileṇassa samantataḥ bahi

original: Anto ca bahi ca sīmā hotīti majjhe ṭhitabhittiyā saha caturassasīmā hoti. Uparipāsādeyeva
analyzed: antar ca bahi ca sīmā hoti iti majjhe ṭhita bhittiyā saha catur assa sīmā hoti

original: hotī”ti iminā gabbhassa ca pamukhassa ca antarā ṭhitabhittiyā ekattā tattha ca ekavīsatiyā
analyzed: hoti iti iminā gabbhassa ca pamukhassa ca antarā ṭhita bhittiyā ekattā tattha ca ekavīsatiyā

original: bhikkhūnaṃ okāsābhāvena heṭṭhā na otarati, uparibhitti pana sīmaṭṭhāva hotīti dasseti.
analyzed: bhikkhūnaṃ okāsa abhāvena heṭṭhā na otarati upari bhitti pana sīmaṭṭhā va hoti iti dasseti

original: Heṭṭhā na otaratīti bhittito oraṃ nimittāni ṭhapetvā kittitattā heṭṭhā ākāsappadesaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhā naḥ otarati iti bhittitaḥ oram nimittāni ṭhapetvā heṭṭhā ākāsa ppadesam

analyzed: na otarati upari kate pāsāde iti attho heṭṭhima tale kuṭṭoti heṭṭhima tale catūsu disāsu

original: ṭhitakuṭṭo. Sace hi dvīsu, tīsu eva vā disāsu kuṭṭo tiṭṭheyya, heṭṭhā na otarati.
analyzed: ṭhita kuṭṭaḥ sace hi dvīsu tīsu eva vā disāsu kuṭṭaḥ tiṭṭheyya heṭṭhā na otarati

original: Heṭṭhāpi otaratīti sace heṭṭhā antobhittiyaṃ ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso hoti, otarati.
analyzed: heṭṭhā api otarati iti sace heṭṭhā antobhittiyam ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnam okāsaḥ hoti otarati

original: Otaramānā ca na uparisīmappamāṇena otarati, samantā bhittippamāṇena otarati. Catunnaṃ

analyzed: pana bhittīnam bāhiranta paricchedena heṭṭhābhūmi bhāge udaka pariyantam katvā otarati

original: na pana bhittīnaṃ bahi kesaggamattampi ṭhānaṃ. Pāsādabhittitoti uparimatale bhittito.

original: Otaraṇānotaraṇaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbanti sace heṭṭhā ekavīsatiyā bhikkhūnaṃ okāso

original: ekasambandhataṃ, tadanto pacchimasīmappamāṇatādiñca sandhāya vutta”nti vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpettha
analyzed: eka sambandhatam tad antaḥ pacchima sīma ppamāṇa tā ādiñca sandhāya vuttan ti vuttam kiñca api ittha

original: niyyūhakādayo nimittānaṃ ṭhitokāsatāya bajjhamānakkhaṇe sīmā na honti, baddhāya pana
analyzed: niyyūhaka ādayaḥ nimittānam ṭhita ukāsa tāya bajjhamāna kkhaṇe sīmāḥ na honti baddhāya pana

original: sīmāya sīmaṭṭhāva hontīti daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: sīmāya honti iti daṭṭhabbā

original: Pariyantathambhānanti nimittagatapāsāṇatthambhe sandhāya vuttaṃ. Uparimatalena sambaddho
analyzed: nimitta gata pāsāṇa tthambhe sandhāya vuttam uparima talena sambaddhaḥ

original: hotīti idaṃ kuṭṭānaṃ antarā sīmaṭṭhānaṃ thambhānaṃ abhāvato vuttaṃ. Yadi hi bhaveyyuṃ,
analyzed: hoti iti idam kuṭṭānam antarā sīmaṭṭhānam thambhānam abhāvataḥ vuttam yadi hi bhaveyyuṃ

original: kuṭṭe uparimatalena asambandhepi sīmaṭṭhathambhānaṃ upari ṭhito pāsādo sīmaṭṭhova
analyzed: kuṭṭe uparima talena asambandhe pi sīmaṭṭha thambhānam upari ṭhitaḥ pāsādaḥ

analyzed: hoti sace pana bahūnam thambha pantīnam upari kata pāsādassa heṭṭhā pathaviyam sabba bāhirāya

original: thambhapantiyā anto nimittapāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmā baddhā hoti, ettha kathanti? Etthāpi
analyzed: thambha pantiyāḥ antar nimitta pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā sīmā baddhā hoti ettha ettha api

original: “yaṃ tāva sīmaṭṭhathambheheva dhāriyamānānaṃ tulānaṃ uparimatalaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ sīmaṭṭhameva,
analyzed: yam tāva sīmaṭṭha thambhehi iva dhāriyamānānam tulānam uparima talam sabbam tat sīmaṭṭham eva

original: ettha vivādo natthi, yaṃ pana sīmaṭṭhathambhapantiyā, asīmaṭṭhāya bāhirathambhapantiyā
analyzed: ettha vivādaḥ natthi yam pana sīmaṭṭha thambha pantiyā a sīmaṭṭhāya bāhira thambha pantiyā

original: ca samadhuraṃ dhārayamānānaṃ tulānaṃ uparimatalaṃ, tattha upaḍḍhaṃ sīmā”ti keci vadanti.
analyzed: ca samadhuram dhārayamānānam tulānam uparima talam tattha upaḍḍham sīmā iti keci vadanti

original: vā gavesitvā tadanuguṇaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: vā gavesitvā tad anuguṇam kātabbam

original: Tālamūlakapabbateti tālakkhandhamūlasadise heṭṭhā thūlo hutvā kamena kiso hutvā uggato

original: hintālamūlasadiso nāma hoti. Vitānasaṇṭhānoti ahicchattakasaṇṭhāno. Paṇavasaṇṭhānoti
analyzed: hintāla mūla sadisaḥ nāma hoti vitāna saṇṭhānaḥ ati ahicchattaka saṇṭhānaḥ paṇava saṇṭhānaḥ iti

original: majjhe tanuko, heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthiṇṇo. Heṭṭhā vā majjhe vāti mudiṅgasaṇṭhānassa
analyzed: majjhe tanukaḥ heṭṭhā ca upari ca vitthiṇṇaḥ heṭṭhā vā majjhe vāti mudiṅga saṇṭhānassa

original: Susirapāsāṇo pana sayaṃ sīmāpaṭibaddhattā sīmā hoti, kathaṃ pana pacchimappamāṇarahitehi
analyzed: susira pāsāṇaḥ pana sayam sīmā paṭibaddha ttā sīmā hoti katham pana pacchima ppamāṇa rahitehi

original: Apicettha susirapāsāṇabhittianusārena mūsikādīnaṃ viya sīmāya heṭṭhimatale otaraṇakiccaṃ

analyzed: baddhāya pacchā heṭṭhābhūmī iyam sīmā otarati eva keci tam na icchanti

original: gahetabbaṃ. Sabbā eva hi baddhasīmā abaddhasīmā ca attano attano pakatinissayake
analyzed: gahetabbam sabbā eva hi baddha sīmā abaddha sīmā ca attanaḥ attanaḥ pakati nissayake

analyzed: gāma arañña ādike khette yathāparicchedam sabbattha sākalyena ekasmin khaṇe byāpinī paramatthato

analyzed: a vijjamānam pi te te nissaya bhūte paramattha dhamme tam tam kiriyā visesam pi vā upādāya

original: lokiyehi sāsanikehi ca yathārahaṃ ekattena paññattattā sanissayekarūpā eva. Tathā
analyzed: lokiyehi sāsanikehi ca yathāraham ekattena paññatta ttā sa nissaya ekarūpāḥ eva tathā

analyzed: agāmake ce bhikkhave araññe samantā satta abbhantarāḥ ayam tattha samāna saṃvāsā eka uposatha iti ādinā

original: sāsane ca ekavohāro dissati, na paramatthato. Ekassa anekadhammesu byāpanamatthi
analyzed: sāsane ca eka vohāraḥ dissati na paramatthataḥ ekassa aneka dhammesu byāpanam atthi

original: kasiṇekadesādivikappāsamānatāya ekattahānitoti ayaṃ no mati.

original: Assa heṭṭhāti sappaphaṇapabbatassa heṭṭhā ākāsapabbhāre. Leṇassāti leṇaṃ ce kataṃ,

original: araññasīmāva, na gāmasīmā. Araññasīmāyampi eseva nayo. Tatthapi hi yattake padese

original: pavesasambhāvanā, tattakameva uparitale araññasīmā pavattati. Tato pana heṭṭhā na
analyzed: pavesa sambhāvanā tattakam eva upari tale arañña sīmā pavattati tato pana heṭṭhā na

original: araññasīmā tattha uparitalena saha ekāraññavohārābhāvato. Na hi tattha paviṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: arañña sīmā tattha upari talena saha eka arañña vohāra abhāvataḥ na hi tattha paviṭṭham

original: araññaṃ paviṭṭhoti voharanti, tasmā tatraṭṭho upari araññaṭṭhānaṃ kammaṃ na kopeti
analyzed: araññam paviṭṭhaḥ iti voharanti tasmā tatraṭṭhaḥ upari arañña ṭhānam kammam na kopeti

original: umaṅganadiyaṃ ṭhito viya uparinadiyaṃ ṭhitānaṃ. Ekasmiñhi cakkavāḷe gāmanadīsamuddajātassare
analyzed: ekasmin hi cakkavāḷe gāma nadī samudda jāta ssare

original: muñcitvā tadavasesaṃ amanussāvāsaṃ devabrahmalokaṃ upādāya sabbaṃ araññameva. ‘Gāmā
analyzed: muñcitvā tad avasesam a manussa āvāsam devabrahma lokam upādāya sabbam araññam eva gāmā

original: vā araññā vā’ti vuttattā hi nadīsamuddajātassarādipi araññameva. Idha pana nadīādīnaṃ
analyzed: vā araññā vā ti vutta ttā hi nadī samudda jāta ssara ādi pi araññam eva idha pana nadī ādīnam

original: visuṃ sīmābhāvena gahitattā tadavasesameva araññaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Tattha ca yattake
analyzed: visum sīmā abhāvena gahita ttā tad avasesam eva araññam gahetabbam tattha ca yattake

original: padese ekaṃ araññanti voharanti, ayamekā araññasīmā. Indapurañhi sabbaṃ ekāraññasīmā,
analyzed: padese ekam voharanti ayam ekā arañña sīmā inda puram hi sabbam ekā arañña sīmā

original: tathā asurayakkhapurādi. Ākāsaṭṭhadevabrahmavimānāni pana samantā ākāsaparicchinnāni
analyzed: tathā asura yakkha pura ādi ākāsa aṭṭha deva brahma vimānāni pana samantā ākāsa paricchinnāni

original: paccekaṃ araññasīmā samuddamajjhe pabbatadīpakā viya. Tattha sabbattha sattabbhantarasīmāyaṃ,
analyzed: paccekam arañña sīmā samudda majjhe pabbata dīpakā viya tattha sabbattha satta abbhantara sīmā ayam

original: araññasīmāyameva vā kammaṃ kātabbaṃ, tasmā idhāpi upariaraññatalena saddhiṃ heṭṭhāpathaviyā
analyzed: arañña sīmāyam eva vā kammam kātabbam tasmai idha api upari arañña talena saddhim heṭṭhā pathaviyā

original: ekāraññavohārābhāvā visuṃ araññasīmāti gahetabbaṃ. Tenevettha gāmanadīādisīmākathāya
analyzed: eka arañña vohāra abhāvā visum arañña sīmā ati gahetabbam tena iva ittha gāma nadī ādi sīmā kathāya

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘iddhimā bhikkhu heṭṭhāpathavitale ṭhito kammaṃ kopetī’ti baddhasīmāyaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam iddhimā bhikkhu heṭṭhā pathavi tale ṭhito kammam kopeti iti baddha sīmāyam

original: dassitanayo na dassito”ti vadanti.
analyzed: dassita nayaḥ na dassitaḥ ti vadanti

original: Idañcetāsaṃ gāmasīmādīnaṃ heṭṭhāpamāṇadassanaṃ suttādivirodhābhāvā yuttaṃ viya dissati,
analyzed: gāma sīmā ādīnam heṭṭhāpamāṇa dassanam sutta ādi virodha abhāvā yuttam viya dissati

original: vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbaṃ. Evaṃ gahaṇe ca gāmasīmāyaṃ sammatā baddhasīmā uparigāmasīmaṃ,
analyzed: vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbam evam gahaṇe ca gāma sīmā ayam sammatā baddha sīmā upari gāma sīmam

original: heṭṭhā udakapariyantaṃ araññasīmañca avattharatīti tassā araññasīmāpi khettanti sijjhati.
analyzed: heṭṭhā udaka pariyantam arañña sīmañca avattharati iti tassāḥ arañña sīmā api khettanti sijjhati

original: Bhagavatā ca “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā”tiādinā nadīsamuddajātassarā baddhasīmāya
analyzed: bhagavatā ca sabbā bhikkhave nadī a sīmā ati ādinā nadī samudda jāta ssarā baddha sīmāya

original: akhettabhāvena vuttā, na pana araññaṃ, tasmā araññampi baddhasīmāya khettamevāti
analyzed: akhetta bhāvena vuttā na pana araññam tasmai araññam pi baddha sīmāya khettam eva ati

original: gahetabbaṃ. Yadi evaṃ kasmā tattha sā na bajjhatīti? Payojanābhāvā. Sīmāpekkhānantarameva
analyzed: gahetabbam yadi evam kasmā tattha sā na bajjhati iti payojana abhāvā sīmā apekkhā anantaram eva

original: hi sattabbhantarasīmāya sambhavato, tassā ca upari sammatāya baddhasīmāya sambhedajjhottharaṇānulomato
analyzed: hi satta bbhantara sīmāya sambhavato tassā ca upari sammatāya baddha sīmāya sambheda ajjhottharaṇa anulomataḥ

original: vipattisīmā eva siyā. Gāmakkhette pana ṭhatvā agāmakāraññekadesampi antokaritvā sammatā
analyzed: vipatti sīmā eva siyā gāma khette pana ṭhatvā a gāma kārañña eka desam pi antokaritvā sammatā

original: kiñcāpi susammatā agāmakāraññe bhagavatā vihitāya sattabbhantarasīmāyapi anivattanato,
analyzed: kiñca api su sammatāḥ agāmakāraññe bhagavatā vihitāya a nivattanato

original: tattha pana kammaṃ kātuṃ paviṭṭhānampi tato bahi kevalāraññe karontānampi antarā
analyzed: tattha pana kammam kātum paviṭṭhānam pi tatas bahi kevala araññe karontānam pi antarā

original: tīṇi sattabbhantarāni ṭhapetabbāni. Aññathā vipatti eva siyāti sabbathā niratthakameva
analyzed: tīṇi sattabbhantarāni ṭhapetabbāni aññathā vipatti eva siyāti sabbathā niratthakam eva

original: agāmake araññe baddhasīmākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: agāmake araññe baddha sīmākaraṇam ti veditabbam

original: Antonadiyaṃ paviṭṭhasākhāyāti nadiyā pathavītalaṃ āhacca ṭhitāya sākhāyapi, pageva
analyzed: antonadiyam paviṭṭha sākhāya ati nadiyā pathavī talam āhat ca ṭhitāya pagā iva

original: anāhacca ṭhitāya. Pārohepi eseva nayo. Etena sabhāganadīsīmaṃ phusitvā ṭhitena visabhāgasīmāsambandhasākhādinā
analyzed: anāhat ca ṭhitāya etena sabhāga nadī sīmam phusitvā ṭhitena visabhāga sīmā sambandha sākhā ādinā

original: udakukkhepasīmāya sambandho na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Eteneva mahāsīmaṃ gāmasīmañca phusitvā
analyzed: udakukkhepa sīmāya sambandhaḥ na vaṭṭati iti dasseti etena iva mahā sīmam gāma sīmañca phusitvā

original: ṭhitena sākhādinā māḷakasīmāya sambandho na vaṭṭatīti ñāpitoti daṭṭhabbo. Antonadiyaṃyevāti
analyzed: ṭhitena sākhā ādinā māḷaka sīmāya sambandhaḥ na vaṭṭati iti ñāpito ti daṭṭhabbaḥ antonadiyaṃya eva ati

original: setupādānaṃ tīraṭṭhitattaṃ nivatteti. Tena udakukkhepaparicchedato bahinadiyaṃ patiṭṭhitattepi
analyzed: setu pādānam tīra ṭṭhita ttam nivatteti tena uda kukkhepa paricchedataḥ bahinadiyam patiṭṭhita tte pi

original: sambhedābhāvaṃ dasseti. Tenāha “bahitīre patiṭṭhitā”tiādi. Yadi hi udakukkhepato
analyzed: sambheda abhāvam dasseti tena āha bahi tīre patiṭṭhitā itiādi yadi hi uda kukkhepato

original: bahi antonadiyampi patiṭṭhitatte sambhedo bhaveyya, tampi paṭikkhipitabbaṃ bhaveyya
analyzed: bahi antonadiyam pi sambhedaḥ bhaveyya tam pi paṭikkhipitabbam bhaveyya

original: kammakopassa samānattā, na ca paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā sabbattha attano nissayasīmāya
analyzed: kamma kopassa samāna ttā na ca paṭikkhittam tasmā sabbattha attanaḥ nissaya sīmāya

original: sambhedadoso natthevāti gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sambheda doso nattha iva ati gahetabbam

original: Āvaraṇena vāti dāruādīni khaṇitvā udakanivāraṇena. Koṭṭakabandhanena vāti mattikādīhi

original: pūretvā katasetubandhanena vā, ubhayenāpi āvaraṇameva dasseti. “Nadiṃ vināsetvā”ti
analyzed: pūretvā kata setubandhanena vā ubhayena api āvaraṇam eva dasseti nadim vināsetvā ati

original: vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā”ti, heṭṭhā nadiṃ āvaritvā pāḷi baddhāti
analyzed: vuttam eva attham vibhāveti heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā ati heṭṭhā nadim āvaritvā pāḷi baddhā ati

original: attho. Chaḍḍitodakanti atirittodakaṃ. Nadiṃ otaritvā sandanaṭṭhānatoti iminā taḷākanadīnaṃ
analyzed: chaḍḍita udakam ti atiritta udakam nadim otaritvā sandana ṭṭhānato ti iminā taḷāka nadīnam

original: antarā pavattanaṭṭhāne na vaṭṭatīti dasseti. Uppatitvāti tīrādibhindanavasena vipulā
analyzed: antarā pavattana ṭṭhāne na vaṭṭati iti dasseti uppatitvā iti tīra ādi bhindana vasena vipulā

original: hutvā. Vihārasīmanti baddhasīmaṃ.
analyzed: hutvā vihāra sīmanti baddha sīmam

original: Agamanapatheti tadaheva gantvā nivattituṃ asakkuṇeyye. Araññasīmāsaṅkhyameva gacchatīti
analyzed: a gamana pathā iti tat aha iva gantvā nivattitum asakkuṇeyye arañña sīmā saṅkhyam eva gacchati iti

original: lokavohārasiddhaṃ agāmakāraññasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tatthāti pakatiyā macchabandhānaṃ
analyzed: loka vohāra siddham agāmakāraññasīmam sandhāya vadati tattha ati pakatiyā maccha bandhānam

original: gamanapathesu dīpakesu.
analyzed: gamana pathesu dīpakesu

original: Taṃ ṭhānanti tesaṃ āvāṭādīnaṃ kataṭṭhānameva, na akatanti attho. Loṇīti samuddodakassa uppattiveganinno mātikākārena pavattanako.
analyzed: tam ṭhānam ti tesam āvāṭa ādīnam kata ṭṭhānam eva na akatam ti attho loṇī ti samudda udakassa uppatti vega ninnaḥ mātikā ākārena pavattanakaḥ

original: Sāratthadīpaniyaṃ pana – gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātuṃ na vaṭṭatīti ettha udakukkhepamanatikkamitvā
analyzed: sāratthadīpaniyam pana gacchantiyā pana nāvāya kātum na vaṭṭati iti ettha udakukkhepam an atikkamitvā

original: parivattamānāya kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti veditabbaṃ. Sīmaṃ vā sodhetvāti ettha sīmāsodhanaṃ
analyzed: parivattamānāya kātum vaṭṭati iti veditabbam sīmam vā sodhetvā iti ettha sīmā sodhanam

original: nāma gāmasīmādīsu ṭhitānaṃ hatthapāsānayanādi. “Nadiṃ vināsetvā taḷākaṃ karontī”ti
analyzed: nāma gāma sīmā ādīsu ṭhitānam hattha pāsā nayana ādi nadim vināsetvā taḷākam karonti iti

original: vuttamevatthaṃ vibhāveti “heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā”ti, heṭṭhā nadiṃ āvaritvā pāḷi baddhāti
analyzed: vuttam eva attham vibhāveti heṭṭhā pāḷi baddhā ati heṭṭhā nadim āvaritvā pāḷi baddhā ati

original: attho. Chaḍḍitodakanti taḷākarakkhaṇatthaṃ ekamantena chaḍḍitamudakaṃ. Deve avassanteti
analyzed: attho chaḍḍita udakanti taḷāka rakkhaṇa attham ekamantena chaḍḍitam udakam deve avassanteti

original: dubbuṭṭhikāle vassānepi deve avassante. Uppatitvāti uttaritvā. Gāmanigamasīmaṃ ottharitvā
analyzed: dubbuṭṭhi kāle vassāne pi deve a vassante uppatitvā ati uttaritvā gāma nigama sīmam ottharitvā

original: pavattatīti vuttappakāre vassakāle cattāro māse abbocchinnā pavattati. Vihārasīmanti
analyzed: pavattati iti vutta ppakāre vassa kāle cattāraḥ māse abbocchinnā pavattati vihāra sīmanti

original: baddhasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati.
analyzed: baddha sīmam sandhāya vadati

original: Agamanapatheti yattha tadaheva gantvā paccāgantuṃ na sakkoti, tādise padese. Araññasīmāsaṅkhyameva
analyzed: a gamana pathā iti yattha tadahā iva gantvā paccāgantum na sakkoti tādise padese arañña sīmā saṅkhyam eva

original: gacchatīti sattabbhantarasīmaṃ sandhāya vadati. Tesanti macchabandhānaṃ. Gamanapariyantassa
analyzed: gacchati iti satta bbhantara sīmam sandhāya vadati macchabandhānam gamana pariyantassa

original: oratoti gamanapariyantassa orimabhāge dīpakaṃ pabbatañca sandhāya vuttaṃ, na samuddappadesanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: oratas ti gamana pariyantassa orima bhāge dīpakam pabbatam ca sandhāya vuttam na samudda ppadesam ti vuttam

original: Sambhindantīti yattha catūhi bhikkhūhi nisīdituṃ na sakkā, tattha tato paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: sambhindanti iti yattha catūhi bhikkhūhi nisīditum na sakkā tattha tatas paṭṭhāya yāva

original: kesaggamattampi attano sīmāya karontā sambhindanti, catunnampi bhikkhūnaṃ pahonakato
analyzed: kesagga mattam pi attanaḥ sīmāya karontā sambhindanti catunnam pi bhikkhūnam pahonakato

original: paṭṭhāya yāva sakalampi antokarontā ajjhottharantīti veditabbaṃ. Saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapāti
analyzed: paṭṭhāya yāva sakalam pi antokarontāḥ ajjhottharanti iti veditabbam saṃsaṭṭha viṭapā ti

original: aññamaññaṃ sibbitvā ṭhitamahāsākhamūlā, etena aññamaññassa atiāsannataṃ dīpeti. Sākhāya
analyzed: aññamaññam sibbitvā ṭhita mahā sākha mūlā etena aññamaññassa ati āsanna tam dīpeti sākhāya

original: sākhaṃ phusantāpi hi dūraṭṭhāpi siyuṃ, tato ekaṃsato sambhedalakkhaṇaṃ na dassitaṃ
analyzed: sākham phusantā api hi dūra ṭṭhā api siyum tatas ekaṃsataḥ sambheda lakkhaṇam na dassitam

original: siyāti taṃ dassetuṃ viṭapaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Evañhi bhikkhūnaṃ nisīdituṃ appahonakaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: siyā ti tam dassetum viṭa paggahaṇam katam evam hi bhikkhūnam nisīditum appahonaka ṭṭhānam

original: attano sīmāya antosīmaṭṭhaṃ karitvā purāṇavihāraṃ karontā sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindanti
analyzed: attanaḥ sīmāya antosīmaṭṭham karitvā purāṇavihāram karontā sīmāya sīmam sambhindanti

original: nāma, na tato paranti dassitameva hoti. Baddhā hotīti porāṇakavihārasīmaṃ sandhāya
analyzed: nāma na tato paranti dassitam eva hoti baddhā hoti iti porāṇaka vihāra sīmam sandhāya

original: vuttaṃ. Taṃ ambanti aparena samayena purāṇavihāraparikkhepādīnaṃ vinaṭṭhattā ajānantānaṃ
analyzed: vuttam tam ambanti aparena samayena purāṇa vihāra parikkhepa ādīnam vinaṭṭha ttā a jānantānam

original: taṃ purāṇavihārasīmāya nimittabhūtaṃ ambaṃ. Attano sīmāya antosīmaṭṭhaṃ karitvā purāṇavihārasīmaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: tam purāṇa vihāra sīmāya nimitta bhūtam ambam sīmāya antar sīmaṭṭham karitvā purāṇa vihāra sīmaṭṭham

original: jambuṃ kittetvā ambajambūnaṃ antare yaṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṃ attano sīmāya pavesetvā baddhāti
analyzed: jambum kittetvā amba jambūnam antare yam ṭhānam tam attanaḥ sīmāya pavesetvā

original: attho. Ettha ca purāṇasīmāya nimittabhūtassa gāmaṭṭhassa ambarukkhassa antosīmaṭṭhāya
analyzed: attho ettha ca purāṇa sīmāya nimitta bhūtassa gāmaṭṭhassa amba rukkhassa anto sīmaṭṭhāya

original: jambuyā saha saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapattepi sīmāya bandhanakāle vipatti vā pacchā gāmasīmāya
analyzed: jambuyā saha saṃsaṭṭha viṭa patte pi sīmāya bandhana kāle vipatti vā pacchā gāma sīmāya

original: saha sambhedo vā kammavipatti vā nāhosīti mukhatova vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: saha sambhedaḥ vā kamma vipatti vā mukhatas va vuttam ti veditabbam

original: Padesanti saṅghassa nisīdanappahonakaṃ padesaṃ. Sīmantarikaṃ ṭhapetvātiādinā sambhedajjhottharaṇaṃ
analyzed: padesanti saṅghassa nisīdana pahonakam padesam sīmantarikam ṭhapetvā ati ādinā sambheda ajjhottharaṇam

original: katvā baddhasīmāpi aññamaññaṃ phusāpetvā abyavadhānena baddhasīmāpi asīmā evāti dasseti,
analyzed: katvā baddha sīmā api aññamaññam phusāpetvā a byavadhānena baddha sīmā api asīmā eva ati dasseti

original: tasmā ekadvaṅgulamattāpi sīmantarikā vaṭṭati eva. Sā pana dubbodhāti aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: tasmai eka dvaṅgula mattā api sīmantarikā vaṭṭati eva sā pana dubbodhā ati aṭṭhakathāsu

original: caturaṅgulādikā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvinnaṃ sīmānanti dvinnaṃ baddhasīmānaṃ. Nimittaṃ
analyzed: catur aṅgula ādikā vuttā ati daṭṭhabbam dvinnam sīmānan ti dvinnam baddha sīmānam nimittam

original: hotīti nimittassa sīmato bāhirattā bandhanakāle tāva sambhedadoso natthīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: hoti iti nimittassa sīmataḥ bāhirattā bandhana kāle tāva sambheda doso natthi iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Na kevalañca nimittakato eva saṅkaraṃ karoti, atha kho sīmantarikāya ṭhito aññopi
analyzed: na kevalam ca nimittakataḥ eva saṅkaram karoti atha kho sīmantarikāya ṭhitaḥ aññaḥ api

original: rukkho karoti eva, tasmā appamattikāya sīmantarikāya vaḍḍhanakarukkhādayo na vaṭṭanti
analyzed: rukkhaḥ karoti eva tasmai appamattikāya sīmantarikāya vaḍḍhanaka rukkha ādayaḥ na vaṭṭanti

original: eva. Ettha ca upari dissamānakhandhasākhādipavesesu eva saṅkaradosassa sabbattha
analyzed: eva ettha ca upari dissamāna khandha sākhā ādi pavesesu eva saṅkara dosassa sabbattha

original: dassitattā adissamānānaṃ mūlānaṃ pavesepi bhūmigatikattā doso natthīti sijjhati.
analyzed: dassita ttā a dissamānānam mūlānam pavese pi bhūmigatika ttā doso natthi iti sijjhati

original: Sace pana mūlānipi dissamānāni neva pavisanti, saṅkarova, pabbatapāsāṇā pana dissamānāpi
analyzed: sace pana mūlāni api dissamānāni na iva pavisanti saṅkaraḥ uva pabbata pāsāṇā pana dissamānā api

original: bhūmigatikāyeva. Yadi pana bandhanakāle eva eko thūlarukkho ubhayampi sīmaṃ āhacca
analyzed: bhūmi gatikāya iva yadi pana bandhana kāle eva ekaḥ thūla rukkhaḥ ubhayam pi sīmam āhat ca

analyzed: paṭhamam sālam na ca pada valañja sambandham

original: katvā sīmā samūhanitabbā”ti pāṭho atthi, “mañcappamāṇe mañcappamāṇe ṭhāne”ti pana

analyzed: ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīditum na sakkonti atimahantī nāma antamasaḥ kesagga mattena pi

analyzed: nimitta kittanam kātabbam tattha asambandha kittanena nimittā sīmā khaṇḍanimittā nāma

original: Imehi tīhi dosehi vimuccanatthāya nimittakittanaṃ kātabbaṃ.

original: Kathaṃ? Kammavācāya porāṇasīmāsamūhananaṃ katvā parisuddhāya kevalāya gāmasīmāya

original: deyyadhammassa sāmino hontīti adhippāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Vimativinodaniyaṃ pana “dakkhiṇodakaṃ
analyzed: deyya dhammassa sāminaḥ honti iti adhippāyaḥ ti vuttam vimati vinodaniyam pana dakkhiṇa udakam

analyzed: upādāya isaḥ evam vutto

analyzed: kālakataḥ hoti bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesuṃ bhikkhussa bhikkhave kālakate saṅghaḥ

analyzed: pattam ca gilāna upaṭṭhākānam dātum yam tattha lahu bhaṇḍam lahu parikkhāram tam sammukhībhūtena

original: āmisadāyajjaṃ vicāresi.
analyzed: āmisa dāyajjam vicāresi

original: Tattha ticīvarapattaavasesalahubhaṇḍagarubhaṇḍavasena āmisadāyajjaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.

original: Tesu ticīvarapattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākassa bhāgo hoti, avasesalahubhaṇḍaṃ sammukhībhūtasaṅghassa,

original: Idāni pana vinayadharā “bhikkhūnaṃ akappiyabhaṇḍaṃ gihibhūtā ñātakā labhantī”ti vadanti,

original: vā”ti, tasmā ñātakā vā hontu aññātakā vā, ye taṃ gilānaṃ upaṭṭhahanti, te gilānupaṭṭhākabhāgabhūtassa
analyzed: vāti tasmai ñātakāḥ vā hontu aññātakāḥ vā ye tam gilānam upaṭṭhahanti te gilāna upaṭṭhāka bhāga bhūtassa

original: dhanassa issarā gahaṭṭhapabbajitā, antamaso mātugāmāpi. Te sandhāya “tesaṃ dātabba”nti

analyzed: vuttam na pana ye gilānam nupaṭṭhahanti te sandhāya vuttam hi aṭṭhakathā ayam gilānupaṭṭhāko

analyzed: kassaci ñātakassa vā aññātakassa vā gahaṭṭhassa vā pabbajitassa vā adāsi koci ca

original: Cīvarabhājanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: piṇḍapāta bhājana kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: sabbam patta sāmikassa hoti iti cīvara ādikam pi sabbam patta sāmikassa iva hoti mayā

analyzed: atthaḥ sabbaḥ saṅghaḥ vuttā iti ettha paṭhamam eva sabba saṅghika bhattam

original: tanti kammaṃ, apalokanādicatubbidhavinayakammaṃ. Itarasmimpi eseva nayo. A-kāro vuddhiattho,
analyzed: tanti kammam apalokana ādi catubbidha vinaya kammam itarasmim pi esa iva nayaḥ akāraḥ vuddhi attho

original: na vuddhippattaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ. Kammañca akammañca kammākammaṃ vajjāvajjaṃ viya,
analyzed: na vuddhippattam kammam akammam kammañca akammañca kamma akammam vajja avajjam viya

original: phalāphalaṃ viya ca. Tattha ca kammanti apalokanakammañattikammadvayaṃ. Akammanti
analyzed: phala aphalam viya ca tattha ca kammanti apalokana kamma ñatti kamma dvayam akammanti

original: ñattidutiyakammañatticatautthakammadvayaṃ. Atha vā kammanti catūsupi etesu lahukakammaṃ.
analyzed: atha vā etesu lahuka kammam

original: Akammanti garukakammaṃ. Kammākammanti ettha pana vinicchayo evaṃ veditabboti yojanā.
analyzed: akammanti garuka kammam kamma akammanti ettha pana vinicchayaḥ evam veditabbaḥ ti yojanā

original: Tattha panāti pakkhantaratthe nipāto, garukāpattivuṭṭhānavinicchayakathāpakkhato
analyzed: tattha pana ati pakkha antara tthe nipātaḥ garuka āpatti vuṭṭhāna vinicchaya kathā pakkhataḥ

original: añño kammākammavinicchayakathāpakkho veditabboti vā mayā vuccateti vā attho.
analyzed: aññaḥ kamma akamma vinicchaya kathā pakkhaḥ veditabbaḥ iti vā mayā vuccate iti vā attho

original: Cattāri kammānīti ettha cattārīti paricchedanidassanaṃ. Tena vinayakammāni nāma cattāri
analyzed: cattāri kammāni iti ettha cattāri iti pariccheda nidassanam tena vinaya kammāni nāma cattāri

original: eva honti, na ito ūnādhikānīti dasseti. Kammānīti paricchinnakammanidassanaṃ. Apalokanakammantiādīni
analyzed: eva honti na itas ūna adhikāni iti dasseti kammāni iti paricchinna kamma nidassanam apalokana kamma nti ādīni

original: paricchinnakammānaṃ uddesakathanaṃ. Tattha apalokīyate āyācīyate apalokanaṃ, apapubbalokadhātu
analyzed: paricchinna kammānam uddesa kathanam tattha apalokīyate āyācīyate apalokanam apapubba lokadhātu

original: āyācanatthe, yupaccayo bhāvatthavācako. Apalokanavasena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ apalokanakammaṃ,
analyzed: āyācana atthe yu paccayaḥ bhāva attha vācakaḥ apalokana vasena kattabbam kammam apalokana kammam

original: sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ apaloketvā saṅghānumatiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. Ñāpanā ñatti, saṅghassa
analyzed: sīmaṭṭhaka saṅgham apaloketvā saṅgha anumatiyā kattabbam kammam ñāpanā ñatti saṅghassa

original: jānāpanāti attho. Ñattiyā kattabbaṃ kammaṃ ñattikammaṃ, anussāvanaṃ akatvā suddhañattiyāyeva
analyzed: jānāpanā ti atthaḥ ñattiyā kattabbam kammam ñatti kammam anussāvanam a katvā suddha ñattiyāya iva

original: kattabbakammaṃ. Dvinnaṃ pūraṇī dutiyā, ñatti dutiyā etassa kammassāti ñattidutiyaṃ,
analyzed: kattabba kammam dvinnam pūraṇī dutiyā ñatti dutiyā etassa kammassa ati ñatti dutiyam

original: ñattidutiyañca taṃ kammañcāti ñattidutiyakammaṃ, ekāya ñattiyā ekāya anussāvanāya
analyzed: ñatti dutiyam ca tam kammam ca ati ñatti dutiya kammam ekāya ñattiyā ekāya anussāvanāya

original: kattabbakammaṃ. Catunnaṃ pūraṇī catutthī, ñatti catutthī etassa kammassāti ñatticatutthaṃ,
analyzed: kattabba kammam catunnam pūraṇī catutthī ñatti catutthī etassa kammassa ati ñatti catuttham

original: ñatticatutthañca taṃ kammañcāti ñatticatutthakammaṃ, ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhi
analyzed: ñatti catuttham ca tam kammam ca ati ñatti catuttha kammam ekāya ñattiyā tīhi anussāvanāhi

original: kattabbakammaṃ. Tena vakkhati “apalokanakammaṃ nāma sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvā”tiādi.
analyzed: kattabba kammam tena vakkhati apalokana kammam nāma sīmaṭṭhaka saṅgham sodhetvā atiādi

original: Evaṃ cattāri kammāni uddisitvā parivāre kammavagge āgatanayeneva tesaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ
analyzed: evam cattāri kammāni uddisitvā parivāre kamma vagge āgata nayena iva tesam catunnam kammānam

original: vipattikāraṇāni pucchitvā vissajjetuṃ “imāni cattāri kammāni katihākārehi vipajjanti?
analyzed: vipatti kāraṇāni pucchitvā vissajjetum imāni cattāri kammāni katihākārehi vipajjanti

original: Pañcahākārehi vipajjantī”tiādimāha. Tattha vatthutoti vinayakammassa kāraṇabhūtavatthuto.
analyzed: pañcahā ākārehi vipajjanti itiādim āha tattha vatthutaḥ ti vinaya kammassa kāraṇa bhūta vatthutaḥ

original: Ñattito anussāvanatoti dvepi kammavācāyameva. Sīmatoti kammakaraṇaṭṭhānabhūtabaddhasīmato.
analyzed: ñattitaḥ anussāvanato ti dve pi kamma vācāyam eva sīmato ti kamma karaṇa ṭṭhāna bhūta baddha sīmato

original: Parisatoti kammappattachandārahabhūtakārakasaṅghato. Tāniyeva hi pañca sabbesaṃ vinayakammānaṃ
analyzed: parisato ti kamma ppatta chanda araha bhūta kāraka saṅghato hi pañca sabbesam vinaya kammānam

original: vipattikāraṇāni honti.
analyzed: vipatti kāraṇāni honti

original: Tato taṃ kammavipattikāraṇabhūtaṃ vatthuṃ pāḷinayena vitthāretuṃ “sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
analyzed: tatas tam kamma vipatti kāraṇa bhūtam vatthum pāḷi nayena vitthāretum sammukhākaraṇīyam

original: kammaṃ asammukhā karoti, vatthuvipannaṃ adhammakamma”ntyādimāha. Tattha sammukhākaraṇīyaṃ
analyzed: kammam asammukhā karoti vatthu vipannam adhamma kamma iti ādim āha tattha sammukhākaraṇīyam

analyzed: paṭipucchākaraṇīyam paṭiññāyakaraṇīyanti imesam tiṇṇam a tathā karaṇena sati vinayaḥ

analyzed: amūḍha vinayaḥ tassapāpiyasikā tajjanīya kammam niyasa kammam pabbājanīya kammam paṭisāraṇīya kammam

analyzed: ukkhepanīya kammam parivāsaḥ mūlāya paṭikassanā mānattam abbhānam upasampadanti imesam

original: terasakammānaṃ aññakammārahassa aññakammakaraṇena, uposatho pavāraṇāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ
analyzed: terasa kammānam añña kamma arahassa añña kamma karaṇena uposathaḥ imesam dvinnam

original: adivase karaṇena, paṇḍako theyyasaṃvāsako titthiyapakkantako tiracchānagato mātughātako
analyzed: a divase karaṇena paṇḍako theyya saṃvāsako titthiya pakkantako tiracchāna gataḥ mātu ghātako

original: pitughātako arahantaghātako lohituppādako saṅghabhedako bhikkhunidūsako ubhatobyañjanako
analyzed: pitu ghātakaḥ arahanta ghātakaḥ lohita uppādakaḥ saṅgha bhedakaḥ bhikkhu nidūsakaḥ ubhatobyañjanakaḥ

analyzed: ūnavīsati vassaḥ antima vatthu ajjhāpanna pubbaḥ ti imesam terasannam puggalānam upasampadā kamma karaṇena

analyzed: iti imāni ekatiṃsa kammāni vatthu vipannam adhamma kammam hoti ñattitaḥ pañca anussāvanato

original: pañcāti imāni dasa kāraṇāni antokammavācāyameva labhanti, sīmato ekādasa kāraṇāni
analyzed: pañca ati imāni dasa kāraṇāni labhanti ekādasa kāraṇāni

analyzed: saṅghānam vasena labhanti iti

original: Evaṃ kammavipattikāraṇāni dassetvā puna catuvaggasaṅghādīsu sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ visesanāmaṃ dassetuṃ “catuvaggakaraṇe kamme”tiādimāha. Taṃ suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: evam kamma vipatti kāraṇāni dassetvā puna catuvagga saṅgha ādīsu sannisinnānam bhikkhūnam visesa nāmam dassetum catuvagga karaṇe kamma iti ādim āha tam su viññeyyam eva

original: 250. Tato paraṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ ṭhānaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “apalokanakammaṃ kati ṭhānāni gacchatī”tiādimāha. Tampi suviññeyyameva.
analyzed: tato param catunnam kammānam ṭhānam saṅkhepataḥ dassetum apalokana kammam kati ṭhānāni gacchati iti ādim āha tat pi su viññeyyam eva

original: 251. Tato tāniyeva kammāni tesu ṭhānesu pavattāni vitthārato pakāsetukāmo “ayaṃ tāva
analyzed: tatas tāniyeva kammāni tesu ṭhānesu pavattāni vitthārato pakāsetu kāmo ayam tāva

original: pāḷinayo. Ayaṃ panettha ādito paṭṭhāya vinicchayakathā”tiādimāha. Tattha tassaṃ vinicchayakathāyaṃ
analyzed: ayam pana ittha āditaḥ paṭṭhāya vinicchaya kathā ati ādim āha tattha vinicchaya kathā ayam

analyzed: catūsu kammesu katamam apalokana kammam nāma ati pucchāyam tam dassetum āha apalokana kammam

original: nāmā”tiādi. Tattha sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghaṃ sodhetvāti avippavāsasaṅkhātamahāsīmaṭṭhakaṃ
analyzed: nāma atiādi tattha sīmaṭṭhaka saṅgham sodhetvā ti a vippavāsa saṅkhāta mahā sīmaṭṭhakam

analyzed: saṅgham sodhetvā na hi khaṇḍa sīmāya sannipatite saṅghe sodhetabba kiccam atthi a vippavāsa sīmā saṅkhātāya

analyzed: sodhetabbam hoti chandāra hānam chandam āharitvā ati tissam sīmāyam catuvagga ādi gaṇam

analyzed: pūretvā hattha pāsam a vijahitvā ṭhitehi bhikkhūhi aññesam hattha pāsam anāgatānam pakatatta bhikkhūnam

analyzed: chandam āharitvā vuttam hi catuvagga karaṇe kamme cattāro bhikkhū pakatattā kammappattā

original: avasesā pakatattā chandārahā”ti. Samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyāti chandassa āharitattā
analyzed: avasesā pakata ttā chandārahā ati samaggassa saṅghassa anumatiyā ati chandassa āharita ttā

original: anumatiyā. Tikkhattuṃ sāvetvāti “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho”tiādinā kammavācaṃ abhaṇitvā

original: “ruccati saṅghassa. Dutiyampi…pe… tatiyampi ruccati saṅghassā”ti tikkhattuṃ sāvetvā
analyzed: ruccati saṅghassa tatiyam pi pe ruccati saṅghassa ati tikkhattum sāvetvā

original: kattabbakammaṃ apalokanakammaṃ nāmāti yojanā. Vuttanayenevāti apalokanakamme vuttanayeneva.

analyzed: iminā sīmaṭṭhaka saṅgham sodhetvā chandāra hānam chandam āharitvā iti idam dvayam

original: atidisati. Itaresupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: atidisati itaresupi e sa iva

original: Tattha tesu catūsu kammesu kiṃ aññakammaṃ itarakammavasena kātabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha

analyzed: āha ñatti dutiya kammam pana atiādi tattha pana saddaḥ visesa attha jotakaḥ ñatti dutiya kamme

original: pana viseso atthīti attho. Ito parāni suviññeyyāneva. Paṭikkhittameva aṭṭhakathāyanti

original: manasi katvā āha “sace panā”tiādi. Tattha akkharaparihīnanti “suṇātu me”tiādīsu su-kāra
analyzed: manasi katvā āha sace pana atiādi tattha akkhara parihīnanti suṇātu mā itiādīsu

original: ṇā-kāra tu-kārādīnaṃ bhassanaṃ. Padaparihīnanti suṇātūtiādīnaṃ vibhatyantapadānaṃ
analyzed: ṇākāra tukāra ādīnam bhassanam suṇātu uti ādīnam vibhati anta padānam

original: bhassanaṃ. Duruttapadaṃ pana upari vakkhati.
analyzed: bhassanam durutta padam pana upari vakkhati

original: Idāni punappunavacane payojanaṃ dassento “idaṃ akuppakamme daḷhikammaṃ hoti, kuppakamme
analyzed: idāni punappunavacane payojanam dassentaḥ idam akuppa kamme daḷhi kammam hoti kuppa kamme

analyzed: kammam hutvā tiṭṭhati iti āha tattha idam ti idam punappunam vutta kammam akuppa kamma iti

analyzed: arahatta phalam adhigantvā jina sāsanam yojanā yathā amhākam bhagavataḥ

original: dhammacakkappavattanasuttantadhammadesanaṃ sutvā aññātakoṇḍaññatthero sotāpattiphalaṃ
analyzed: dhammacakka ppavattana suttanta dhamma desanam sutvā aññātakoṇḍañña thero sotāpatti phalam

original: patvā pacchā arahattaphalaṃ adhigantvā jinasāsanaṃ sobhesi, evanti attho. Ito aññānipi
analyzed: patvā pacchā arahatta phalam adhigantvā jina sāsanam sobhesi evam ti atthaḥ itas aññāni pi

original: nayāni yathā therassa vacanānukūlāni, tāni paṇḍitehi cintetabbāni.
analyzed: nayāni yathā therassa vacana anukūlāni tāni paṇḍitehi cintetabbāni

original: Nigamanakathāvaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nigamana kathā vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Jambudīpatale ramme, marammavisaye sute;
analyzed: jambu dīpa tale ramme maramma visaye sute

original: Tambadīparaṭṭhe ṭhitaṃ, puraṃ ratananāmakaṃ.
analyzed: tamba dīpa raṭṭhe ṭhitam puram ratana nāmakam

original: Jinasāsanapajjotaṃ, anekaratanākaraṃ;
analyzed: jina sāsana pajjotam aneka ratana ākaram

original: Sādhujjanānamāvāsaṃ, soṇṇapāsādalaṅkataṃ.
analyzed: sādhujjanānam āvāsam soṇṇa pāsāt alaṅkatam

original: Tasmiṃ ratanapuramhi, rājānekaraṭṭhissaro;
analyzed: tasmim ratanapuramhi rājā aneka raṭṭhissaraḥ

original: Sirīsudhammarājāti, mahāadhipatīti ca.
analyzed: ca

original: Evaṃnāmo mahātejo, rajjaṃ kāresi dhammato;
analyzed: evaṃnāmaḥ mahā tejaḥ rajjam kāresi dhammataḥ

original: Kārāpesi rājā maṇi-cūḷaṃ mahantacetiyaṃ.
analyzed: rājā maṇicūḷam mahanta cetiyam

original: Tassa kāle brahāraññe, tiriyo nāma pabbato;
analyzed: tassa kāle brahāraññe tiriyaḥ nāma pabbato

original: Pubbakāraññavāsīnaṃ, nivāso bhāvanāraho.
analyzed: pubba kārañña vāsīnam nivāsaḥ bhāvanā rahaḥ

original: Aṭṭhārasahi dosehi, mutto pañcaṅgupāgato;
analyzed: aṭṭhārasahi dosehi muttaḥ pañcaṅga upāgato

original: Araññalakkhaṇaṃ patto, baddhasīmāyalaṅkato.
analyzed: arañña lakkhaṇam pattaḥ

original: Tasmiṃ pabbate vasanto, mahāthero supākaṭo;
analyzed: tasmin pabbate vasantaḥ mahā theraḥ supākaṭaḥ

original: Tipeṭakālaṅkāroti, dvikkhattuṃ laddhalañchano.
analyzed: tipeṭaka alaṅkāraḥ ti dvi kkhattum laddha lañchanaḥ

original: Tebhātukanarindānaṃ, garubhūto supesalo;
analyzed: garu bhūtaḥ su pesalaḥ

original: Kusalo pariyattimhi, paṭipattimhi kārako.
analyzed: kusalaḥ pariyattimhi paṭipattimhi kārako

original: Sohaṃ lajjīpesalehi, bhikkhūhi abhiyācito;
analyzed: saḥ aham lajjī pesalehi bhikkhūhi abhiyācitaḥ

original: Sāsanassopakārāya, akāsiṃ sīlavaḍḍhanaṃ.
analyzed: akāsim sīla vaḍḍhanam

original: Vinayālaṅkāraṃ nāma, lajjīnaṃ upakārakaṃ;
analyzed: vinayālaṅkāram nāma upakārakam

original: Suṭṭhu vinayasaṅgaha-vaṇṇanaṃ sādhusevitaṃ.
analyzed: suṭṭhu vinaya saṅgaha vaṇṇanam sādhu sevitam

original: Rūpachiddanāsakaṇṇe, sampatte jinasāsane;
analyzed: rūpa chidda nāsa kaṇṇe sampatte jina sāsane

original: Chiddasuññasuññarūpe, kaliyugamhi āgate.
analyzed: chidda suñña suñña rūpe kali yugamhi āgate

original: Niṭṭhāpitā ayaṃ ṭīkā, mayā sāsanakāraṇā;
analyzed: niṭṭhāpitā ayam ṭīkā mayā sāsana kāraṇā

original: Dvīsu soṇṇavihāresu, dvikkhattuṃ laddhaketunā.
analyzed: dvīsu soṇṇa vihāresu dvi kkhattum laddha ketunā

original: Iminā puññakammena, aññena kusalena ca;
analyzed: iminā puñña kammena aññena kusalena ca

original: Ito cutāhaṃ dutiye, attabhāvamhi āgate.
analyzed: itas dutiye atta bhāvamhi āgate

original: Himavantapadesamhi, pabbate gandhamādane;
analyzed: himavanta padesamhi pabbate gandhamādane

original: Āsanne maṇiguhāya, mañjūsakadumassa ca.
analyzed: āsanne maṇi guhāya mañjūsaka dumassa ca

original: Tasmiṃ hessaṃ bhummadevo, atidīghāyuko varo;
analyzed: tasmin hessam bhummadevaḥ ati dīgha āyukaḥ varaḥ

original: Paññāvīriyasampanno, buddhasāsanamāmako.
analyzed: paññā vīriya sampannaḥ buddha sāsana māmakaḥ

original: Yāva tiṭṭhati sāsanaṃ, tāva cetiyavandanaṃ;
analyzed: yāva tiṭṭhati sāsanam tāva cetiya vandanam

original: Bodhipūjaṃ saṅghapūjaṃ, kareyyaṃ tuṭṭhamānaso.
analyzed: bodhi pūjam saṅgha pūjam kareyyam tuṭṭha mānasaḥ

original: Bhikkhūnaṃ paṭipannānaṃ, veyyāvaccaṃ kareyyahaṃ;
analyzed: bhikkhūnam paṭipannānam veyyāvaccam kareyyaham

original: Pariyattābhiyuttānaṃ, kaṅkhāvinodayeyyahaṃ.
analyzed: pariyatta abhiyuttānam kaṅkhā vinodayeyyaham

original: Sāsanaṃ paggaṇhantānaṃ, rājūnaṃ sahāyo assaṃ;
analyzed: sāsanam paggaṇhantānam rājūnam sahāyaḥ assam

original: Sāsanaṃ niggaṇhantānaṃ, vāretuṃ samattho assaṃ.
analyzed: sāsanam niggaṇhantānam vāretum samatthaḥ assam

original: Sāsanantaradhāne tu, mañjūsaṃ rukkhamuttamaṃ;
analyzed: tu mañjūsam rukkham uttamam

original: Nandamūlañca pabbhāraṃ, niccaṃ pūjaṃ kareyyahaṃ.
analyzed: nanda mūlam ca pabbhāram niccam pūjam kareyyaham

original: Yadā tu paccekabuddhā, uppajjanti mahāyasā;
analyzed: yadā tu paccekabuddhāḥ uppajjanti mahā āyasā

original: Tadā tesaṃ niccakappaṃ, upaṭṭhānaṃ kareyyahaṃ.
analyzed: tadā tesam nicca kappam upaṭṭhānam kareyyaham

original: Teneva attabhāvena, yāva buddhuppādā ahaṃ;
analyzed: tena iva atta bhāvena yāva buddhuppādāḥ aham

original: Tiṭṭhanto buddhuppādamhi, manussesu bhavāmahaṃ.
analyzed: tiṭṭhantaḥ buddhuppādamhi manussesu bhavāmaham

original: Metteyyassa bhagavato, pabbajitvāna sāsane;
analyzed: metteyyassa bhagavataḥ pabbajitvāna sāsane

original: Tosayitvāna jinaṃ taṃ, labhe byākaraṇuttamaṃ.
analyzed: tosayitvāna jinam tam labhe byākaraṇa uttamam

original: Byākaraṇaṃ labhitvāna, pūretvā sabbapāramī;
analyzed: byākaraṇam pūretvā sabba pāramī

original: Anāgatamhi addhāne, buddho hessaṃ sadevaketi.
analyzed: anāgatamhi addhāne buddhaḥ hessam sa devaka iti

original: Vinayālaṅkāraṭīkā samattā.
analyzed: vinayālaṅkāra ṭīkā samattā
